pricing.title: BASIC WEBSITE
pricing.description: A simple, static website to showcase your business, services, orportfolio — fast, clean, and mobile-friendly.
features: Up to 5 responsive pages (Home, About, Services, Contact, etc.)
Clean, modern design tailored to your brand
